attributes.action: Make producers of plastic products responsible for recycling
attributes.additional_details: Look around every where ,some form of plastic pollution .littering roads .where you live ,almost any where. Does not seem plastic industry concerned
attributes.background: Stop plastic products polluting the environment and future population having to deal with these issues.need action sooner than later.and bring back paper bags or packaging.which is easier to recycle .and will decompose.rather than none decomposing plasticstics.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.  

We're not quite sure what you mean by "making producers of plastic products responsible for recycling". 

If you want to reduce and end unnecessary single-use plastics, you may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/200189
